TEXT.TITLE: UNION <UEL.TO> ENDS PACT TO SELL CANBRA <CBF.TO>
TEXT.BODY: Union Enterprises Ltd said its agreement to sell its interest in Canbra Foods Ltd to Macluan Capital Corp has been terminated. Union said Macluan failed to make an offer for Union's 72 pct interest in Canbra before the June 22 deadline. Union said it is no longer bound by the agreement and is continuing to seek a buyer for the interest. Reuter
